undefined.name: Imeon Energy
undefined.description: IMEON ENERGY develops intelligent inverters dedicated to photovoltaic installations in self-consumption. It allows simultaneous use of several sources of energy (photovoltaic / battery / public network) to mitigate the fluctuation of solar production and ensure a constant supply of energy to the equipped site. IMEON now integrates true embedded intelligence. IMEON thus become the nerve center of a photovoltaic installation.
